mapper.select: SELECT FirstPointLat, FirstPointLng, SecondPointLat, SecondPointLng, ThirdPointLat, ThirdPointLng, FourthPointLat, FourthPointLng, CentroidLat, CentroidLng FROM PolygonPoints WHERE user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RouteProperties (USER_ID, ROUTE_ID, PAGE, SEC_LEN, UP_MIN, DOWN_MIN, CAT_NAM, MNTN_NM, GEOMETRY, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{routeId}, #{page}, #{secLen}, #{upMin}, #{downMin}, #{catNam}, #{mntnNm}, ST_GeomFromText(#{geometry}), #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId}, NOW())
